About Us

Dynamic

Nimble

EXPERTS IN OUR FIELD

We at Alert Boundary PTY believe in understanding the customers requirement and proposing the right solution by innovation and optimization.

We believe in supplying high quality long lasting products so that it requires minimal maintenance and no replacements considering the corrosive environments present here. At the same time, we are also future proofing our products from security threats point of view.

We strive to consistently provide honest efficient service from the initial enquiry through to the design and manufacture process and right up to the installation of your chosen Fencing system.

We have a long list of happy customers who we can call upon to provide you with feedback on our Product and service delivery. For complete peace of mind put us to the test Today!

The guarantee also ensures that the product will not crack, become brittle or deteriorate in any way, in the harsh South African Climate.

No job is too large as we are equipped to deal with all types of site and jobs. Our friendly and hard-working staff will always work to the highest of standards.

Andries Visser | CEO

With over thirty years of experience in a variety of engineering roles, Andries is recognized at national levels as a passionate and hardworking entrepreneur.

he has an outstanding resume, which highlights her skill set in both the direct manufacturing of high-end products and also as a problem solver, renowned for rejuvenating the construction businesses and returning them to prosperity.

An excellent leader, excelling at building successful teams, he is admired throughout the industry for his hard-earned reputation for engendering trust and customer loyalty and his round the clock availability for his clients. Andries drive, personality and leadership style is underpinned by the perseverance and stamina that have earned him a reputation as one of the most honourable and respected construction professionals on the national stage

As one of Cape Town's leading suppliers & installers of steel fencing materials, here at Alert Boundary, we believe in creating an experience where you the customer, comes first. For steel fencing supplies and qualified fencing installers, we offer products from Cape Town's most trusted brands and can source products for you at competitive prices.
